summary: **Grand Theft Auto V (2013)** is an action-adventure game by Rockstar Games. Set in the fake state of San Andreas (like Southern California), you play as three criminals: Michael, Franklin, and Trevor. They try to pull off heists while avoiding corrupt cops and dangerous criminals. You can explore the huge open world on foot or in vehicles. The game has an online mode where up to 30 players can play together. It was very popular and made a lot of money, but also caused debates about its violent content. It's one of the best-selling games ever, with over 200 million copies sold.
title: Grand Theft Auto V
